member.name: T:Telerik.XamarinForms.Input.Calendar.Commands.CalendarCommand
member.summary: Represents a command abstraction that is associated with a particular instance.

member.name: P:Telerik.XamarinForms.Input.Calendar.Commands.CalendarCommand.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the value for this instance. This value is used to associate a command with a known event within a instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.Input.Calendar.Commands.CalendarCommandService.ExecuteCommand(Telerik.XamarinForms.Input.Calendar.Commands.CommandId,System.Object)
member.summary: Attempts to find the command, associated with the specified Id and to perform its Execute routine, using the provided parameter.
member.param: The parameter that is passed to the CanExecute and Execute methods of the command.
member.returns: True if the command is successfully executed, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.Input.Calendar.Commands.CalendarCommandService.ExecuteDefaultCommand(Telerik.XamarinForms.Input.Calendar.Commands.CommandId,System.Object)
member.summary: Executes the default (built-in) command (without looking for user-defined commands), associated with the specified Id.
member.param: The parameter that is passed to the CanExecute and Execute methods of the command.
member.returns: True if the command is successfully executed, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.Input.Calendar.Commands.CalendarCommandService.CanExecuteCommand(Telerik.XamarinForms.Input.Calendar.Commands.CommandId,System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the command, associated with the specified Id can be executed given the parameter provided.
member.param: The parameter that is passed to the CanExecute and Execute methods of the command.
member.returns: True if the command can be executed, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.Input.Calendar.Commands.CalendarCommandService.CanExecuteDefaultCommand(Telerik.XamarinForms.Input.Calendar.Commands.CommandId,System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the default command, associated with the specified Id can be executed given the parameter provided.
member.param: The parameter that is passed to the CanExecute and Execute methods of the command.
member.returns: True if the command can be executed, false otherwise.
